nodes.text: The KVT-Series 400 fanjet was a podracer engine designed and produced by Keizar-Volvec prior to the Invasion of Naboo.

The KVT-Series 400 was a type of high-thrust fanjet engine designed by Keizar-Volvec for use in their KV9T9-B Wasp Podracer. A pair of these engines were equipped with a sophisticated control system that allowed the Podracer to take full advantage of their ample thrust power.
